mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTORID, t1.WFACTORNAME, t1.WFACTORPARAM, t1.WFACTORPARAM2, t1.WFACTORTYPE FROM T_SRFWFACTOR t1
SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WFACTORID`, t1.`WFACTORNAME`, t1.`WFACTORPARAM`, t1.`WFACTORPARAM2`, t1.`WFACTORTYPE` FROM `T_SRFWFACTOR` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTORID, t1.WFACTORNAME, t1.WFACTORPARAM, t1.WFACTORPARAM2, t1.WFACTORTYPE FROM T_WFACTOR t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTORID, t1.WFACTORNAME, t1.WFACTORPARAM, t1.WFACTORPARAM2, t1.WFACTORTYPE FROM T_SRFWFACTOR t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTORID, t1.WFACTORNAME, t1.WFACTORPARAM, t1.WFACTORPARAM2, t1.WFACTORTYPE FROM T_SRFWFACTOR t1
SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[WFACTORID], t1.[WFACTORNAME], t1.[WFACTORPARAM], t1.[WFACTORPARAM2], t1.[WFACTORTYPE] FROM [T_SRFWFACTOR] t1
